specification.description: A trust line specification that would produce this trust line in its current state.

limit.description: The maximum amount that the issuer can be owed through the trust line.

ripplingDisabled.description: If true, payments cannot ripple through this trustline.

frozen.description: If true, the trust line is frozen, which means that funds can only be sent directly to the issuer.

authorized.description: If true, the issuer authorizes this party to hold issuances from the issuer.

issuer.description: Properties of the trustline from the perspective of the issuer.

balance.description: The balance on the trust line, representing which party owes the other and by how much.

state.description: Non-settings details of the trust line's state.
